ygData.subject: Re: Tishan's Kilt
ygData.msgSnippet: Make sure you are killing Shadowed men, not Shadowed women.  :) On another note. Shadow men spawn in numerous zones, maybe you ll have better luck elsewhere.
ygData.messageBody:
Make sure you are killing Shadowed men, not Shadowed women. :)

On another note. Shadow men spawn in numerous zones, maybe you'll have
better luck elsewhere.

Not confirmed, just an idea

Cheers

> Has anyone gotten the shadowed ball for the kilt yet? I camped the
> other day with two of my level 40+ friends (warrior and a cleric) and
> we killed shadowed men nonstop (as fast as was possible. We were
> constantly waiting for them to respawn, and they respawn in about 5
> min or so) for about 3 hours strait and I saw several shadowed
> patches, eye, fist, mask, book, shining stone, and numberless weapons,
> but no ball. Is it possible to get it or is it super rare??
>
